comments.en:
6-ink (CcMmYK) high-end photo printer with roll feeder, automatic paper cutter, full bleed (borderless) printing, prints also directly on CDs.

96 nozzles per color.

USB and Parallel.

Supported in Gimp-Print 4.2.2rc2, 4.3.4, or newer.

In Europe sold as Epson Stylus Photo 950.

Consumables/Refills: 6 separate ink tanks: Cyan, light cyan, magenta, light magenta, yellow, black
